title: [Temple, Bedroom]
description: A tattered tapestry hangs from the wall, fluttering in the breeze coming from the broken window to the west.  Outside, thunder rumbles, shaking the shards of glass left in the panes.  The dirt and clutter have been swept to the east side of the room by the wind, beneath a collapsed bed.

A tattered tapestry hangs from the wall, fluttering in the chill night breeze coming from the broken window to the west.  Outside, thunder rumbles, shaking the shards of glass left in the panes.  The dirt and clutter have been swept to the east side of the room by the wind, beneath a collapsed bed.
